title: Easy bean salad
ingredients: ['1 (400g) tin kidney beans, drained and rinsed', '1 (400g) tin chickpeas, drained and rinsed', '1 (400g) tin cannellini beans, drained and rinsed', '1 (220g) tin water chestnuts, drained and chopped', '175g (6 oz) shop-bought tomato salsa', '2 to 4 tablespoons French dressing', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste']
